name: Button (Omar, AntaresRising)
description:
Button is a 2D top-down rogue-lite where you play as a small mouse traversing through a large forest, with only a small, button shield to protect you. 

Dash and dodge around the forest creatures, reflecting their projectiles and collecting berries along the way. 

Buy upgrades from the helpful shopkeep as you make your way to the end of the forest. 

Game by: Omar Uraimov, Catherine Su, Alec LeFurgy

Art by: Catherine Su

Music by: Emma Trowbridge, Jaden Raso

Use WASD to move, [Space] to dash, and [c] or [m] to block/reflect projectiles

Sound effects from: soundsnap.com
